oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Steamboats; Gunboats; Sailors; Navies; Vessels; Naval warfare; Warships
United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Steamboats; Gunboats; United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Rivers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: US Navy warship, the USS Vindicator, with soldiers on the top deck in front of the wheel boxes and on the bow. There is a cannon on the stern and three smaller boats tied to the USS Vindicator.

Many existing side-wheel steamboats were modified for miltary use in the Civil War with reinforcements of timber, iron, or tin being added to the decks. This vessel was not armored at all and used its heavy guns and ram prow to handle Confederate warships.
